initialization.custom_script:
yum_repos:
    centos-ovirt42:
      baseurl: http://mirror.centos.org/centos/7/virt/x86_64/ovirt-4.2
      enabled: true
      gpgcheck: false
  packages:
    - ovirt-guest-agent
    - epel-release
    - centos-release-openshift-origin311
  runcmd:
    - systemctl enable ovirt-guest-agent
    - systemctl start ovirt-guest-agent
    - sleep "$(($RANDOM % 30))"
    - sync
